criteria.name: Realism
criteria.description: The timeline is achievable and realistic given the project scope and complexity.

criteria.name: Clarity
criteria.description: The timeline is clearly presented with well-defined phases, milestones, and deadlines.

criteria.name: Completeness
criteria.description: The timeline includes all necessary project activities without significant omissions.

criteria.name: Logical Sequencing
criteria.description: Activities are logically sequenced with appropriate dependencies and relationships.

criteria.name: Milestone Definition
criteria.description: Key milestones are clearly identified and appropriately distributed throughout the timeline.

criteria.name: Contingency Planning
criteria.description: The timeline includes buffer periods or contingency plans for potential delays.

criteria.name: Resource Consideration
criteria.description: The timeline accounts for resource availability and constraints.

criteria.name: Critical Path Awareness
criteria.description: The timeline identifies or accounts for the critical path of project activities.

criteria.name: Client Alignment
criteria.description: The timeline aligns with client expectations, deadlines, and business cycles.

criteria.name: Appropriate Detail
criteria.description: The timeline provides the right level of detail - neither too granular nor too high-level.

evaluationInstructions: Evaluate the timeline against each criterion. For each criterion, provide a score between 0.0 and 1.0, where 0.0 is completely failing to meet the criterion and 1.0 is perfectly meeting it. Provide specific feedback for scores below the pass threshold.
